brjhaverkamp <notifications@github.com> hat geschrieben:this is a feature request.

i would like to see something similar to the way kontact (kaddressbook) is handling contact names. in the vcf there are 2 entries: n (name) which contains the structured representation of the name. there is also the fn field, which contains a formatted name string.
the formatted name in turn is used in the label field.

proposal is to be able to edit the formatted name seperately, by adding it to the dialog for editing the name. this allows to put the correct first name and family name to be put in the n field and a string like "fam. schneider" in the fn and label field. this is similar to the way kontact uses the "display name" setting.
